tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the workshop.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using dedicated tenant for Oracle Cloud World 2023.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Overview of security services in OCI
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through OCI security.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Run your first OCI security assessment
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to run your first OCI security assessment report that will make you have that Unique Security Experience.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: View reports on OCI Security Center Dashboard
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to automate the journey to security by using the OCI Security Center.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
